Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Albany College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences.
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Pharmacy na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife
Nzere Master na Practice Pharmacy na nzere Dọkịta nke Pharmacy (Pharm
D.) site na UNC Eshelman School of Pharmacy, Chapel Hill
Na 2016, Tofade ghọrọ Dean na Prọfesọ na Howard University College nke Pharmacy dị na Washington, DC

A họpụtara Toyin Tofade n'afọ 2020 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche-nhopụta nke ngalaba ụlọ ọgwụ agụmakwụkwọ International Pharmaceutical Federation (FIP), nke mere ya ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị ojii mbụ akpọrọ aha dịka onye otu FIP
